transcript: I think I can say this I don't think I've ever publicly hated or thrown shade on someone and it's because I never want to send my customers to somebody else like I never to send my audience that I work so hard to to somebody else especially if I don't like them why would I do that right why would I give them that gift why would I waste time on my platform to not deliver any value to my audience and then direct them to a competitor what a moronic thing to do
